item.title: Protocol 2023-W48: Base Building
item.description:
ðŸ“… Weekly Schedule

Day Type Workout
Friday Run 4 miles at Zone 2 (HR <150)
Saturday Brick + Content Creation 30-minute bike + 20-minute run, followed by 1 hour of content creation (Twitter thread or blog post)
Sunday Long Run 6 miles at Zone 2 (HR <150)

ðŸŽ¯ Training Goals

  • Build a solid aerobic base in swimming and cycling
  • Maintain running endurance while transitioning to triathlon
  • Preserve strength PRs (300 lb deadlift, 225 lb squat)

ðŸš€ Startup Goals

  • Complete core features for MVP
  • Begin beta testing with 5 users
  • Document progress and lessons learned in a blog post

ðŸ“Š Weekly Targets

Cardio Volume:

ðŸ§  AI AGENT INSTRUCTIONS

Hi agent! Your job is to help me live the best version of my life. This repository contains the logs of my days in simple text format.

Mission

Help me plan my weeks and days as a top 0.01% individual who excels across multiple domains simultaneously: triathlon training, startup building, ML/AI engineering, and content creation.

Current Focus

Primary: Triathlon training (swim/bike/run) while maintaining strength Secondary: Launch startup MVP + create content to dogfood the product
